data.title: Brilliant Minds: Release date, episode schedule, streaming & cast
data.meta_description: "Brilliant Minds" is set in the world of neurology which is viewed from Dr. Wolf's perspective, exploring the complexities of the human mind. The series also navigates the personal relationships and mental health challenges faced by the team of interns.
data.text:
Synopsis

"Brilliant Minds" is set in the world of neurology which is viewed from Dr. Wolf's perspective, exploring the complexities of the human mind. The series also navigates the personal relationships and mental health challenges faced by the team of interns.

Zachary Quinto, known for his role as Sylar in Heroes, is making a comeback to NBC in the upcoming series Brilliant Minds. Set to premiere on September 23 at 10/9c, the show marks Quinto's return to the network after fourteen years.

#Budget' 2024 with ET

Union Budget 2024 Live Updates

A New Role for Quinto

In Brilliant Minds, Quinto takes on the role of Dr. Oliver Wolf, a neurologist inspired by real-life figure Dr. Oliver Wolf Sacks. Unlike his infamous character in Heroes, Quinto's Dr. Wolf is dedicated to saving lives, leading a team of interns in treating neurological disorders. The cases portrayed in the series draw from Sacks' extensive research on brain disorders, as mentioned in a report by TV Guide.

Quinto's Perspective

Reflecting on his role, Quinto expressed enthusiasm about portraying a character based on a real-life figure like Sacks. "He is ultimately our North Star," Quinto remarked at the Television Critics Association summer press tour in July. "I'm not tethered to [Sacks'] behavior, but drawing from his rich tapestry has been a unique opportunity for me”, as quoted in TV Guide’s report.

Plot and Themes

Brilliant Minds explores the intricacies of neurology through Dr. Wolf's perspective, delving into the human mind while also addressing personal relationships and mental health challenges among the team of interns. Showrunner Michael Grassi noted that the title change from Dr. Wolf to Brilliant Minds reflects the series' focus on both the medical professionals and their patients.

Release Date and Schedule

NBC has slated Brilliant Minds to premiere on September 23, immediately following The Voice on Mondays. The first season is set to consist of 13 episodes, promising a comprehensive exploration of the medical and personal journeys of the characters, as per the TV Guide report.

The Cast

Apart from Quinto, the cast includes Tamberla Perry, Ashleigh LaThrop, Alex MacNicoll, Aury Krebs, Spence Moore II, Teddy Sears, and Donna Murphy. Guest stars for the season include André De Shields, Steve Howey, and Mandy Patinkin, each adding depth to the narrative with their unique roles.

Streaming Options

Brilliant Minds will air on NBC and will be available for streaming on Peacock the day after each episode airs, providing viewers with flexible viewing options.

FAQs:

What is the new series Brilliant Minds on NBC?

The show description for "Brilliant Minds" on the broadcaster reads, "'Brilliant Minds' follows a pioneering neurologist and his team of interns as they explore the final frontier — the human mind. Alongside their professional endeavors, they navigate personal relationships and confront mental health challenges."

Will Criminal Minds: Evolution continue?

"Criminal Minds: Evolution" has been greenlit for Season 3 on Paramount+. Production for the upcoming season is set to begin later this year.
